--- Nosecone / Scattershot / Afterburner / Pacifix / Crossroads ---

Nosecone transforms as he enters behind Lightspeed, "Arright, Hoist. 
I'll get to it immediately. He transforms again, and drives over to 
the wall. He begins drilling and has soon underminded the foundations 
of the building and it begins to topple, onto him.

Scattershot nods, "I'm there." He runs over to a section of the ruble 
on the ground, and begins to clean it up. He understands the need for 
quickness and completion.

Afterburner salutes Hoist as he follows him, "So where are we going?

Pacifix finds the CR chamber with the almost dead Switchblade in 
it. "I see." He opens the chamber up, and pulls out the disabled 
bot. "We can't have you causing any terrorist activities, so I'll 
give you to Ironhide and Sunstreaker to deal with." He carries the 
bot outside to Ironhide, "Ironhide, here is the bot that JetV put 
into the CR chamber, you should keep him in a containment cell when 
his wounds repair. He may still be dangerous when you have him 
completely repaired, since he attacked us."

Crossroads watches Pacifix and nods his agreement as the other bot 
carries the enemy out of the ship. "Good job, we need to leave soon, 
or we may be discovered."
